html:
I think $MAP - @MapProtocol is still looking very good here

Valuation - $110 million

Someone asked me if I didn't think this was one the high side.
This requires context, it's a Bitcoin L2.
It's direct competitor, STX is valued at $1,6 billion, 16X higher.
So, definitely not.â€¦

— Road2Crypto (@CryptoDamus411) December 19, 2023
